item.title: What in Half Life made you want to play HL2 and why?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
I liked how well Valve had Half-Life’s story slowly unravel itself without cutscenes just scripted events. By the end of the game, If you payed attention, you know just as much What the Hell happened as Gordon.
Years later I see in a game magazine that Half-Life 2 is coming out! I read the page(they screwed up and said Alyx was gordon’s daughter lol), waited for a trailer, and thought the graphics looked way too cool for a game being released in 2004. I saved up money, got the game, and It’s that same, you’re in the game WTF is going on, feeling from the first one.

Overall I think it’s the style of play and the incredible storyline.

item.title: What in Half Life made you want to play HL2 and why?
item.dc:creator: Zachy_180
item.description:
I played all the classic Half Lifes (Blue Shift, Opposing Force…) and I loved them all. I loved the story, and it was generally a fun game. Although to me, the environment got a little monotonous (that’s just me). I remember how long I waited for HL2 to come out, and man! I also wanted to play it because I saw the CP with the masks and stunsticks on the advertisements, and thought to myself, what’s this? I just wanted to complete the story and have some more fun. COME ON FUCKING EP3! I’M WAITING!
